Liono looks at the temple in the desert "well this is it Africa" 

Tigerhawk looks at Liono "This is the valley of the Roaring Winds" Sits down 
in the sand the seal is in the temple.

Liono looks at Tigerhawk "I'll go it alone from here" Liono walks towards the 
temple as the wind starts to Pick up creating a hurricane or sand Strom 
rather sucking Liono
As Liono is slung around his paint being striped form his armor now he cuts 
on his jets and goes against the wind letting as get closer to the temple.

Tigerhawk looks at the sand Strom " 4, 3, 2, 1 now!"

Liono gets slung out off the into the desert skidding a making a trail 

Tigerhawk looks at the hurricane " That force is greater than you work with 
it know the power is your master let it flow and ride."
   
Liono stands up slowly  "In English?"

Tigerhawk looks at Liono "Shut up and ride the wind" 

Liono walks towards the Strom and lets himself get sucked in and doesn't 
fight the storm but spreads his wings lets it carry him higher. As he enters 
the air pocket he Pushes towards the temple. The halls are silent and he 
walks slowly towards the temple  this is it looks at the hand holds "Thats a 
fake the power is in the seal not that but where" looks at the walls steps 
forward to hear a cling Liono looks down and touches the ground red lines 
stream up into Liono.

Tigerhawk watches as the wind disappears "where do we go form here and what 
power did you gain."

Liono as the temple crumbles "None that I can tell my yet?"

Tigerhawk  Looks at Liono "your hands are Altered the bracelet is gone." 

Liono looks at the tablet "The power is growing closer lets go to the arctic 
circle there is the next seal."
